« Un cookie est un petit fichier stocké: “A cookie is a small file stored by a server in the terminal (computer, telephone, etc.) of a user and associated with a web domain (that is to say in the majority of cases with all the pages of the same website). This file is automatically returned during subsequent contacts with the same domain. Cookies have multiple uses: they can be used to remember your customer ID with a merchant site, the current content of your shopping cart, the language of display of the web page, an identifier allowing to track your navigation for statistical or advertising purposes, etc. ”. Information from the official CNIL website (https://www.cnil.fr/fr/glossaire)
